alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 11:02AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...AND SOUTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to a half mile. This band of heavy snow is producing heavy snow at the rate of over 1 inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1100 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Fredonia to near Concord and slowly moving south. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Springville, Westfield, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Mayville, North Collins, Lake Erie State Park, East Concord, SUNY Fredonia, Chautauqua Institution, Chautauqua, Concord, Collins, Portland, Sheridan, Ripley, Stockton and New Albion. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 61 and 58. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
